omopColumns.name: nhs_number
omopColumns.query:
select 
	apc.NHSNumber, 
	apc.GeneratedRecordIdentifier,
	apc.HospitalProviderSpellNumber,
	max(apc.CDSActivityDate) as observation_date,
	apc.PregnancyTotalPreviousPregnancies
from [omop_staging].[sus_APC] apc
where apc.NHSNumber is not null
	and apc.PregnancyTotalPreviousPregnancies is not null
	and apc.CDSActivityDate is not null
	and apc.CdsType in ('140', '120')
group by 
	apc.NHSNumber, 
	apc.GeneratedRecordIdentifier, 
    apc.HospitalProviderSpellNumber,
	apc.PregnancyTotalPreviousPregnancies;

omopColumns.name: RecordConnectionIdentifier

dataSource.name: GeneratedRecordIdentifier
dataSource.description: CDS specific identifier that binds multiple CDS messages together.

omopColumns.query:
select 
	apc.NHSNumber, 
	apc.GeneratedRecordIdentifier,
	apc.HospitalProviderSpellNumber,
	max(apc.CDSActivityDate) as observation_date,
	apc.PregnancyTotalPreviousPregnancies
from [omop_staging].[sus_APC] apc
where apc.NHSNumber is not null
	and apc.PregnancyTotalPreviousPregnancies is not null
	and apc.CDSActivityDate is not null
	and apc.CdsType in ('140', '120')
group by 
	apc.NHSNumber, 
	apc.GeneratedRecordIdentifier, 
    apc.HospitalProviderSpellNumber,
	apc.PregnancyTotalPreviousPregnancies;

omopColumns.name: HospitalProviderSpellNumber

dataSource.name: HospitalProviderSpellNumber
dataSource.description: CDS specific hospital spell number that binds many episodes together.

omopColumns.query:
select 
	apc.NHSNumber, 
	apc.GeneratedRecordIdentifier,
	apc.HospitalProviderSpellNumber,
	max(apc.CDSActivityDate) as observation_date,

	and apc.PregnancyTotalPreviousPregnancies is not null
	and apc.CDSActivityDate is not null
	and apc.CdsType in ('140', '120')
group by 
	apc.NHSNumber, 
	apc.GeneratedRecordIdentifier, 
    apc.HospitalProviderSpellNumber,
	apc.PregnancyTotalPreviousPregnancies;

omopColumns.name: observation_concept_id
omopColumns.operation_description: Constant value set to `4078008`. Number of previous pregnancies

omopColumns.name: observation_type_concept_id

omopColumns.name: value_as_number

dataSource.name: TotalPreviousPregnancies
dataSource.description: PREGNANCY TOTAL PREVIOUS PREGNANCIES is the number of previous pregnancies resulting in one or more REGISTRABLE BIRTHS.
